Title: Prohibits residential and commercial properties from erecting or installing digital billboards or signs that use flashing, intermittent or moving lights near certain Mitchell-Lama housing
Summary: Prohibits residential and commercial properties from erecting or installing digital billboards or signs that use flashing, intermittent or moving lights near certain Mitchell-Lama housing within a city with a population of one million or more; relates to the effectiveness thereof.
LawCode: Amd ยง397-b, Gen Bus L; amd ยง2, Chap of 2023 (as proposed in S.1931-B & A.7456-A)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting residential and commercial properties from erecting or installing digital billboards or signs that use flashing, intermittent or moving lights near certain Mitchell-Lama housing; and to amend a chapter of the laws of 2023 amending the general business law relating to prohibiting residential and commercial properties from operating digital billboards or signs that use flashing, intermittent or moving lights near certain Mitchell-Lama housing, as proposed in legislative bills numbers S.1931-B and A.7456-A, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
